price: 64. Markaasay dib isugu noqdeen oo ay yidhaahdeen: Xaqiiq idinkaa daalimiin ah.”
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
